general_advisory: For better agricultural benefits use OUAT KALINGA Value Added Products, Fingerlings/ Yearlings, VermiCompost, and Farm Implements. IMD Weather forecast and Agro-meteorological advisory of Odisha location is now available on Meghdoot.

advisory: False smut: False smut disease may be seen in paddy field. To manage the same, spray Propiconazole or Copper oxychloride.
Neck Blast: To control Neck Blast diseases, first drain out excess water from the paddy field. Spray Hexaconazole or Azoxystrobin+ Difenoconazole.
Top dressing of fertilizer for maize crop has started.
Sugarcane is at grand growth stage.
Cotton crop is in boll formation stage.
Pod Borer Management: There are chances of Pod borer infestation in black gram crop. To manage, spray Emamectin Benzoate or Chlorantraniliprole.
Pod Borer Management: There are chances of Pod borer infestation in green gram crop. To manage Bihar hairy caterpillar, spray Emamectin Benzoate or Profenophos.
Pre-sowing stage: Before sowing of seeds, seed treatment should be done with Carbendazim or Carboxin + Thiram.
Fruiting and Harvesting: To manage the infestation of Fruit flies, spray Malathion. To control the Powdery mildew disease, spray Dinocap or Carbendazim.
Flowering/Fruiting: The plants showing wilting symptoms can be uprooted/destroyed away from the field.
Phomopsis blight: To reduce the Phomopsis blight disease in brinjal, spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb or Zineb.
Liver fluke infestation in sheep: Liver Fluke is a great enemy of Sheep. Infestation of this worm can be controlled by using specific drugs or by duck rearing.
Liver fluke infestation in goats: Liver Fluke is a great enemy of Goats. Infestation of this worm can be controlled by using specific drugs or by duck rearing.
